trans-unit.source: Provides information about installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre plug-ins serializadores instalados.

trans-unit.source: Plug-in serializer classes derive from and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> interface.
trans-unit.target: Derivam de classes do serializador de plug-in e implementar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> interface.

trans-unit.source: The following examples illustrate using a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor> to return information on installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos a seguir ilustram o uso de um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor> retornar informações sobre instalado serializadores plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the assembly that contains the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do assembly que contém o serializador.

trans-unit.source: The name of the assembly (usually a DLL) that contains the plug-in serializer.
trans-unit.target: O nome do assembly (geralmente uma DLL) que contém o serializador de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the assembly file that contains the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o caminho do arquivo do assembly que contém o serializador.

trans-unit.source: The path to the assembly file that contains the plug-in serializer.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o arquivo de assembly que contém o serializador de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the assembly that contains the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão do assembly que contém o serializador.

trans-unit.source: The version of the assembly that contains the plug-in serializer.
trans-unit.target: A versão do assembly que contém o serializador de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: The source of data for the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: A fonte de dados do novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> through a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> por meio de uma implementação de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> fornecida.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> with its properties initialized with values from the given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> com suas propriedades inicializadas com valores da implementação <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> fornecida.

trans-unit.source: Only full trust callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: Somente os chamadores totalmente confiáveis podem usar esse método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="factoryInstance" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="factoryInstance" /> é nulo.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the following properties of the <paramref name="factoryInstance" /> is null: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerName" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerWebsite" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DefaultFileExtension" />
trans-unit.target: Uma ou mais das seguintes propriedades de <paramref name="factoryInstance" /> é nula: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerName" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerWebsite" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DefaultFileExtension" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the default extension associated with files that the serializer outputs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a extensão padrão associada a arquivos que o serializador gera como saída.

trans-unit.source: The default extension associated with files that the serializer outputs.
trans-unit.target: A extensão padrão associada a arquivos que o serializador gera.

trans-unit.source: The following examples illustrate using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DefaultFileExtension%2A> to return the default file extensions for installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos a seguir ilustram o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DefaultFileExtension%2A> para retornar o padrão extensões de arquivo instalado serializadores plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Gets the public display name of the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de exibição público do serializador.

trans-unit.source: The public display name of the serializer.
trans-unit.target: O nome de exibição públicos do serializador.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A> to obtain and display the public name of a plug-in serializer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A> para obter e exibir o nome público de um serializador de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado com este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />.

trans-unit.source: Tests two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: Testa dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambos forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.Equals%2A> returns `true` even if the two objects differ in one or more of the following properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerWebsite%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.Equals%2A> Retorna `true` mesmo se os dois objetos forem diferentes em uma ou mais das seguintes propriedades: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.ManufacturerWebsite%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> derived class that implements the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da classe derivada <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> que implementa o serializador.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> derived class that implements the serializer.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> derivado da classe que implementa o serializador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique hash code value of the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor do código hash exclusivo do serializador.

trans-unit.source: The unique hash code value of the serializer.
trans-unit.target: O valor do código hash exclusivo do serializador.

trans-unit.source: The unique hash code value is created based on the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.FactoryInterfaceName%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> properties of the serializer.
trans-unit.target: O valor de código hash exclusivo é criado com base no <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyPath%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.FactoryInterfaceName%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> propriedades do serializador.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the serializer can be loaded with the currently installed version of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o serializador pode ser carregado com a versão atualmente instalada do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the serializer assembly can be loaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o assembly de serializador pode ser carregado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A> should be **false** unless <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> has the same value as <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A> deve ser **false** , a menos que <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> tem o mesmo valor como <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following examples illustrate using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A> to determine if the associated plug-in serializer can be loaded and used.
trans-unit.target: Os exemplos a seguir ilustram o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.IsLoadable%2A> para determinar se o serializador de plug-in associado pode ser carregado e usado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the company that developed the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da empresa que desenvolveu o serializador.

trans-unit.source: The name of the company that developed the plug-in serializer.
trans-unit.target: O nome da empresa que desenvolveu o serializador de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: Plug-in serializer classes derive from and implement the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> interface.
trans-unit.target: Derivam de classes do serializador de plug-in e implementar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets the web address of the company that developed the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o endereço web da empresa que desenvolveu o serializador.

trans-unit.source: The web address of the company that developed the serializer.
trans-unit.target: O endereço web da empresa que desenvolveu o serializador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] required by the serializer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] requerida pelo serializador.

trans-unit.source: The version of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] required by the plug-in serializer.
trans-unit.target: A versão do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] exigido pelo serializador de plug-in.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> must have the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> or the serializer assembly cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A> deve ter o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A> ou o assembly de serializador não pode ser carregado.
